channel.title: Sigsiu.NET News
channel.description: Latest News of Sigsiu.NET, the company behind SobiPro - best directory component for Joomla! powered websites!

item.title: An update of the Contact Form Field is available
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: The last day of the year 2015 comes with an update of the Contact Form Field which got a new Bootstrap 3 compatible layout for the forms.

item.title: SobiPro 1.2.1 available
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: We just released SobiPro 1.2.1. It comes with a bunch of new features such as back-end ACL and advanced template settings. It is recommended to update SobiPro.

item.title: Indonesian and Dutch Languages updated
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: Updated versions of the Indonesian and Dutch languages are now available to download.

item.title: Holiday Special
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: The Holiday season is coming, and some of us get presents under a Christmas tree. But our Holiday special is available for all!

item.title: Update for SP-GeoMap Field available
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: An update of the SP-GeoMap Field is available. This is a maintenance release with adaption of the layout to the new default3 template of SobiPro 1.2.

item.title: Aggregation Field update
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: An update of the Aggregation Field is available. It is now completely adapted to the new default3 template of SobiPro 1.2.

item.title: Catalan Language for SobiPro
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: The Catalan language is now available to download. Thus SobiPro is now translated into 28! languages.

item.title: Review and Rating Application updated
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: The first release of the upcoming package, an update of the Review and Rating Application is available now.

item.title: What's coming next
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: We are going to release as next package: the Review & Rating app, the Aggregation Field, the SP-GeoMap Field, SobiPro 1.2.1, the Contact Form Field and SobiRestara 3.0!

item.title: Black Friday and Cyber Monday Sales
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: The holiday shopping season starts... From Black Friday to Cyber Monday, we offer a 20% discount! Stay tuned!
